About checkmirrors

Checkmirrors was established in 2014. The company director is Sarah Hellowell who has over 17 years experience instructing.

We are a small company with experienced driving instructors in York who give total quality tuition assuring complete safety for each pupil.

Our aim is not just to teach people to pass a driving test but to teach a skill for life so when they leave us they are a safe and competent driver.

Data Privacy

Checkmirrors values your data privacy. We will only ever use your data to contact you about specific enquiries made unless otherwise agreed. Your data will never be disclosed to or used by another business or external third party. By clicking submit, you agree to allow checkmirrors to contact you about your above enquiry.
